page.title: 18Three Pubs in Tickhill
page.content: In our area there are three pubs.The times of opening are Monday-Friday 1030 to 1500.Monday-Thursday 1800 to 2230,Friday-Saturday 1600-2300, Sundays 1200-1400 and 1900-2230. {The Millstone}-Stones Brewery-Tenants own all the inside fixtures/fittings. It is hard work and long hours but rewarding.21 regular part-time workers are used but special functions need more .Trade is 50% local.In summer trade comes more from outside Tickhill The ballroom is to be refurbished soon.Saturday pm is the busiest.{ {Carpenters Arms}-John Smith Brewery. Tenants have lived there for 9 years.Trade is 50% local.They find no need to serve food.Money taken in 1984/85 miners'strike was 10% down. {Travellers Rest}-Free House,it is a listed building.The new owner plans interior alterations.
